nt_bdr wrote:
> Does Heretrix follow Java Script Links or Can it be configured to
> follow such links?

Heritrix looks for strings in Javascript that appear likely to be 
absolute or relative URIs, and follows those -- taking the chance of 
getting 'not-found' errors or other problems in order to get more actual 
content. It does not execute Javascript in any way, so links that are 
constructed (for example by string concatenation) will not be found.

- Gordon @ IA
